function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
var result = bean.execute("1006",$Login.User.UserID,"1",O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,"lcIB_CWSJGXLC",'',O_WORKFLOW.CWSJGXSSNF.JDSZ);
var code =result.get('result');
code ==1;

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where GPLX = 3 and id = ? and KPJD=111",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where SFWCXC = 3 and id = ? and KPJD in (112,113,114)",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC])

cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1);

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);

var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where SFWCXC = 3 and id = ? and KPJD in (112,113,114)",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC])

cnt==1&&cnt1==0&&cnt2==0;

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批

dynOwner.expression:
["instr(',' ||
 (select owner
 from (select owner
 from jgcrm.os_historystep
 where step_id = 32
 and action_id = 33
 and entry_id = (select instid
 from ecif.lcIB_CWSJGXLC
 where id = {0})
 order by finish_date asc)
 where rownum = 1) || ',',
 ',' || id || ',') > 0 or instr(',' ||
 (select owner
 from (select owner
 from jgcrm.os_historystep
 where step_id = 32
 and action_id <0
 and entry_id = (select instid
 from ecif.lcIB_CWSJGXLC
 where id = {0})
 order by finish_date asc)
 where rownum = 1) || ',',
 ',' || id || ',') > 0",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.ID","length":0,"scale":0,"type":0}]]

step.name: 项目组部门总经理审核

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where GPLX = 3 and id = ? and KPJD=111",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where SFWCXC = 3 and id = ? and KPJD in (112,113,114)",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC])

cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1);

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_CWSJGXLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_CWSJGXLC",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
  true;
}else{
  false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select status from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_NBBNBSPB') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1
